googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Winner Gee
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We are extremely happy with the request response time, professionalism, friendliness, and quick resolution of our plumbing issue. Sean and Elias arrived on time (less than 2 hours after we reached out to the company) and resolved our problem in less than 3 hours. Bravo! We're definitely going to use this company going forward.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: America's Best Services LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: LaQuentin Ragland
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I would not recommend. The guy comes 4+ hours late. I had to continue to contact the guy to get his ETA. It still was longer than he stated each time. I had already explained to them what the issue was and where the pipe was located (roots growing in the line). I asked him if he wanted to come and see what was the issue from inside. He states that because I had told him what the issue was, he was 90% sure it was the same issue. He shoves a stick in the ground where I told him the line was located and says that it will be $460. I simply tell him I wasn’t expecting to pay that much. I will give him the service fee so that he can head back home safely. I understood that there was a service fee, but I didn’t receive any service at all. He did nothing other than stick a rod in the ground. He tells me that his company paid $112 to come out so I basically shouldn’t complain about the $79. Also, due to him showing up several hours late, I wasn’t able to contact any other businesses. He also spins out of my driveway after telling him I planned to leave this review. I respect the trade of a plumber wholeheartedly. I don’t respect this one’s way of making some easy money without doing anything.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: America's Best Services LLC

plumberResearchFull.json:
Here is the detailed information about America's Best Services LLC in Alabama, based on the provided identifiers:

## Business Information

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**: America's Best Services LLC is registered in Alabama, but specific registration details such as the registration date and license number are not provided in the sources. However, it is mentioned that plumbers in Alabama must be licensed by the Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, which suggests that America's Best Services LLC would need to comply with this requirement[3].
- **Physical Location and Service Areas**: The business is located at 1210 River Haven Ln, Hoover, AL 35244-1256. They serve areas in and around Hoover, Alabama[1][4].
- **Hours and Payment Methods**: The sources do not specify the business hours or payment methods used by America's Best Services LLC.
- **Years in Operation**: The business has been operating for approximately 3 years, as indicated by the BBB file opened on September 14, 2021[1].

## Services & Specialties

- **Types of Services Offered**: America's Best Services LLC offers a range of plumbing and drain services, including:
  - Leak detection
  - Water restoration
  - Cleanup and mold remediation
  - New installations
  - General plumbing and drain services[1][4].
- **Service Areas Covered**: They serve residential and commercial clients in the Hoover area and possibly other nearby regions in Alabama[1][4].
- **Emergency Service Availability**: The business provides emergency services, although specific details about the availability and response times are not mentioned[3][4].
- **Prices or Rates**: There are no specific prices or rates listed for America's Best Services LLC in the sources. However, general pricing for plumbing services in similar areas can range from $94 to $313, depending on the service[3].

## Customer Reviews & Reputation

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**: The business has a rating of 3 based on 2 reviews, but the sources do not provide detailed summaries or specific examples of these reviews.
- **BBB Rating and Status**: America's Best Services LLC is not a BBB Accredited Business and has a BBB Rating of C+. The reasons for this rating include failure to respond to 1 complaint filed against the business and the length of time the business has been operating[1].
- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**: There is limited information available on common customer feedback themes, but the BBB rating suggests there may be issues with customer complaint response.
- **Response to Reviews**: The business has failed to respond to at least one complaint filed against it, according to the BBB[1].

## Owner & Staff

- **Owner/Management Information**: The sources do not provide specific information about the owner or management of America's Best Services LLC.
- **Staff Qualifications**: The business is described as having certified and skilled professional plumbers with experience and the know-how to complete jobs correctly. However, specific details about individual staff qualifications or professional certifications are not available[4].
- **Professional Certifications**: While the business mentions having certified plumbers, there is no detailed information on specific certifications held by the staff[4].
aboutUs: At America's Best Services LLC, we are a team of highly skilled and certified plumbing professionals dedicated to providing exceptional service to residential and commercial clients in Hoover and the surrounding areas. Our expertise spans a wide range of plumbing and drain services, including leak detection, water restoration, cleanup and mold remediation, as well as new installations and general plumbing repairs. With a focus on local service, we take pride in our ability to quickly respond to your plumbing needs and deliver solutions tailored to your specific requirements.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing company committed to delivering superior workmanship and customer satisfaction.
sellingPoints: Certified and experienced professionals equipped with the latest tools and techniques to handle any plumbing challenge efficiently and effectively.
Prompt emergency services available 24/7 to ensure your plumbing issues are addressed promptly, minimizing potential damage and inconvenience.
Comprehensive range of services, from leak detection and water restoration to new installations and general repairs, ensuring a one-stop solution for all your plumbing needs.
